answers.answer: I was told not to eat after 12 the night before. Good luck!
You are usually suppose to eat a regular meal before hand. Nothing you wouldn't normall eat, but not sugar packed either. Did they give you an instruction sheet?
I have my test in two weeks and they told me to have a normal breakfast before coming in. In the PA's words: "Just don't have a soda and a snicker's bar before coming in"
Renshai, ok thanks, I guess that cuts out my morning Mountain Dew lolmami2karina, no i didnt get any instructions besides to just eat something before coming in to the office.

question: So happy I get to see my Lil bean monday at 12:30, hoping for a Boy. doc said today that everything was perfect Im measuring right on track and my lil beans HB was 145/80 (i think the 80 is correct,I know the 145 is.) I have to go back for OB app on march 2nd for the Diabetes test. any idea what I should eat before I i do the test? I usually have a bowl of cereal ( honey nut cheerios).
title: U/S sceduled for Monday YAY!!!! not question just bragging a lil bit
